faqs.question: What is Sandlot Picks Analytics?
faqs.answer: Sandlot Picks Analytics is a data-driven platform that provides predictive analytics and insights for MLB betting. We use advanced machine learning models and statistical analysis to help you make informed betting decisions on player props and game outcomes.

faqs.question: How accurate are your predictions?
faqs.answer: Our models are continuously validated using metrics like RMSE (Root Mean Squared Error) and RÂ² (Coefficient of Determination). While no prediction is 100% accurate, our models are trained on years of historical data and updated regularly to maintain high accuracy. We transparently share our model performance metrics with our users.

faqs.question: Is this a gambling service?
faqs.answer: No, we are not a gambling service. Sandlot Picks Analytics provides educational content and analytical insights to help you make informed decisions. We do not accept bets, facilitate gambling, or guarantee winnings. All betting decisions are your own responsibility.

faqs.question: Do I need to create an account?
faqs.answer: Currently, our platform offers free access to basic analytics and predictions without requiring an account. Premium features and advanced analytics may require account creation in the future.

faqs.question: How do I join the Discord community?
faqs.answer: You can join our Discord community by clicking the Discord icon in our footer or visiting discord.com/invite/CQsrtNp4S7. Our community is free to join and provides daily discussions, insights, and direct support from our team.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Currently, we don't have a dedicated mobile app, but our website is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. You can access all features through your mobile browser with the same functionality as desktop.

faqs.question: What types of predictions do you offer?
faqs.answer: We specialize in MLB player prop predictions including hits, runs, strikeouts, home runs, and other performance metrics. Our models analyze batter vs. pitcher matchups, recent form, ballpark factors, weather conditions, and historical performance data.

faqs.question: When are predictions updated?
faqs.answer: Predictions are updated daily based on confirmed starting lineups, latest player statistics, injury reports, and other relevant factors. We recommend checking predictions closer to game time for the most accurate information.

faqs.question: How do you calculate predictions?
faqs.answer: Our predictions use machine learning models trained on historical MLB data. We employ advanced regression techniques, feature engineering, and real-time matchup analysis. Key factors include player statistics, pitcher-batter history, ballpark factors, weather conditions, and recent performance trends.

faqs.question: What do the confidence scores mean?
faqs.answer: Confidence scores indicate how certain our model is about a prediction based on historical accuracy and data quality. Higher confidence doesn't guarantee success but indicates stronger statistical backing. We recommend considering both the prediction and confidence level when making decisions.

faqs.question: Where does your data come from?
faqs.answer: We aggregate data from multiple reliable sources including official MLB statistics, advanced baseball metrics providers, and historical game data. All data is verified and cross-referenced to ensure accuracy.

faqs.question: What advanced metrics do you use?
faqs.answer: We utilize advanced sabermetrics including wOBA (Weighted On-Base Average), xFIP (Expected Fielding Independent Pitching), BABIP (Batting Average on Balls in Play), barrel rate, exit velocity, launch angle, and many others. Check our Glossary page for detailed explanations.

faqs.question: How often is your data updated?
faqs.answer: Statistical data is updated daily after games conclude. Real-time factors like lineups, injuries, and weather are monitored continuously and updated as information becomes available.

faqs.question: Do you guarantee winning bets?
faqs.answer: No. We do not and cannot guarantee winning bets. Sports betting involves inherent risk and uncertainty. Our analytics are designed to provide informed insights, not guaranteed outcomes. Always bet responsibly and never wager more than you can afford to lose.

faqs.question: What is responsible gambling?
faqs.answer: Responsible gambling means setting limits, never chasing losses, only betting what you can afford to lose, and recognizing when gambling becomes a problem. If you or someone you know has a gambling problem, call 1-800-GAMBLER for help.

faqs.question: How should I use your predictions?
faqs.answer: Our predictions should be one factor in your decision-making process. Consider combining our analytics with your own research, current events, and risk tolerance. Use proper bankroll management and never rely solely on any single source for betting decisions.

faqs.question: What is bankroll management?
faqs.answer: Bankroll management involves setting aside a specific amount of money for betting and wagering only a small percentage (typically 1-5%) on any single bet. This strategy helps protect your funds and allows you to weather losing streaks without going broke.

faqs.question: Why isn't a prediction showing?
faqs.answer: Predictions may not show if: starting lineups aren't confirmed, a player is injured or not starting, there's insufficient historical data for the matchup, or our model lacks confidence in making an accurate prediction. We only display predictions that meet our quality standards.

faqs.question: I found a bug. How do I report it?
faqs.answer: We appreciate bug reports! Please use our Contact page and select 'Report a Bug' from the dropdown. Provide as much detail as possible including what you were doing, what went wrong, and any error messages you saw.

faqs.question: What browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: Our platform works best on modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge (latest versions). We recommend keeping your browser updated for the best experience and security.

faqs.question: Is Sandlot Picks free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! Currently, we offer free access to our analytics, predictions, and community. We may introduce premium features in the future, but our core mission is to provide valuable insights accessible to everyone.

faqs.question: Will you add other sports?
faqs.answer: We're focused on perfecting our MLB analytics first. While we've designed our platform to be modular and scalable for other sports, we currently have no immediate plans to expand beyond baseball. Stay tuned to our announcements!

faqs.question: How is my data protected?
faqs.answer: We take privacy seriously. We don't collect unnecessary personal information, use industry-standard encryption, and never sell your data to third parties. Read our Privacy Policy for complete details on data handling and protection.

faqs.question: Do you use cookies?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use cookies for essential functionality like remembering your preferences and for analytics to improve our service. We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

faqs.question: How can I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us through our Contact page or email us directly at support@sandlotpicks.com. We typically respond within 24 hours. For immediate help, join our Discord community where team members and other users can assist you.

faqs.question: Can I contribute or provide feedback?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We welcome feedback, feature requests, and suggestions. Use our Contact page and select 'General Feedback' or 'Feature Request'. Your input helps us improve and better serve the community.
